attribute.description: The Level code where the free Promotion applies. The free product details can be an at product item or product level.
This column is populated for multi free promotion types only.
This is list of Promotion details model for Free product list.
This is list of Promotion details model for Free product list.

itemtype.description: For Different Free Promotion eligible product list with quantity and Product Level

attribute.description: The Level code where the Promotion applies. This can have up to 4 values. 1 Product Group code 8 digit long eg 60001000 2 Product group code concatenated with the material group 1. This material group code is three digits long. Eg 60001000100. 3 Product group code concatenated with material code 1 and 2. It is up to 14 digits long. This is not how SAP holds their levels so will need to do some translation from this level to the information you have from SAP. 9. This means product code level. See separate section for more detail.
This is the required quantity to be brought to qualify for the promotion. This is only populated if the promotion is multi required ticked on.
This is list of Promotion details model for source product list.
This is list of Promotion details model for source product list.
This is list of Promotion details model for source product list.
This is list of Promotion Free model for Free product list.
The date the promotion was setup.
The date the promotion was amended.
The time the promotion starts at. This is used with the start date [HH:MI].
The time the promotion ends at. This is used with the end date [HH:MI].
Cph Price code for specific customer.
Cph Price code for specific customer.

This indicator is used to determine if it is an AND or OR relationship on the promotion detail table. If this is ticked on the product and quantities in the promotion detail table all are required to be brought before the promotion is valid. If ticked off any combination of the products listed on promotion detail need to be brought up to the required quantity or value.

This is like the multi required but only applies if free products. If ticked on all the products listed in the free table are free otherwise any combination of the products are free up to the free quantity defined on the header.

This will be set to Y if the promotion was set-up with the web location as part of the branch list. This is required as branch specific promotions applied ahead of linked promotions that applies to all branches.
If this is set the promotion will only apply for cash transactions.

This is the required quantity to be brought to qualify for the promotion. If multi required turned on then this column is not used but the required quantity on the promotion detail table is used instead
This is the free quantity to be applied for the promotion. If multi free indicator turned on then this column is not used but the free quantity on the promotion free table is used instead.

This allows the promotion to only apply for certain days of the week. The valid values are MON, TUE, WED, THU, FRI, SAT, SUN. This column is comma delimited and can contain more than one day. E.g. FRI,SAT,SUN would mean it only applies to these days within the start and end date range

This allows the promotion to only apply for certain days of the week. The valid values are MON, TUE, WED, THU, FRI, SAT, SUN. This column is comma delimited and can contain more than one day. E.g. FRI,SAT,SUN would mean it only applies to these days within the start and end date range
The message to show when the promotion has fired.
The message to show when the promotion could have potentially fire.
Percentage discount.
Percentage discount.
This is the discount value off applied if required quantity of products in cart. This discount off will be applied on total price of required quantity.
This is the discount value off excluding taxes
